sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Overdose Prevention and Harm Reduction Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Overdose Prevention and Harm Reduction Act.

sections.heading: Needle and hypodermic syringe access program.
sections.text: Needle and hypodermic syringe access program.

sections.heading: Dispensing of drug adulterant testing supplies
sections.text: A pharmacist, physician, advanced practice registered nurse, or physician assistant, or the pharmacist's, physician's, advanced practice registered nurse's, or physician assistant's designee, or a trained overdose responder for an organization enrolle

sections.heading: Fentanyl test strips. To further promote harm reduction efforts, a pharmacist or retailer may sell fentanyl test strips over-the-counter to the public to test for the presence of fentanyl, a fentanyl analog, or a drug adulterant within a controlled substance

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
